text:
Currently we have complex patternsets that define where the numerous libraries 
for web projects are located. Since they are in several locations - we have to 
use copy with the flatten=true option to a single temporary folder before 
adding libraries to our WAR files under WEB-INF/lib.
It would be nice not to go through this temporary copying routine.
Adding mapper support or at minimum some sort of flattening would be very 
helpful.
